description:
Tsurugi is 31-years-old, the eldest of the Yagami sisters, and is a teacher at http://anidb.net/ch47887 [Sasami]`s high school. Despite her age, she has the appearance of a little girl and has the personality of a middle-aged man. She often plays adult games in the staff room.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Yagami Tsurugi
